summary: Implements a GridSubsetAccessor class that offers methods to extract portions of an unstructured grid using spatial criteria such as bounding boxes, polygons, or point selections. It leverages an internal spatial index to quickly locate relevant cells and returns the corresponding subset data.
business_intent: Allow analysts and developers to efficiently retrieve and work with specific regions of large unstructured grid datasets, facilitating focused analysis, visualization, and downstream processing without loading the entire grid.
